Description:
The new project from the creator of the legendary Resident Evil series Shinji Mikami and talented team of developers Tango Gameworks, The Evil Within - a true embodiment of the genre Survival Horror. The world will turn upside down , pulling you into a treacherous tangle of intrigue and the cycle of nightmares.If you can break the vicious circle ? The latest technology of lighting and animation , available through the engine id Tech 5, realistic creatures surround you and make you sick fantasies to experience a truly animal fear .

include Russian

Install Notes:

5. Play the game.
6. Support the software developers. If you like this game, BUY IT!
